ValidationRule.description: If the current user is not a HQ user, only valid Change Reason can be inserted (400 - 409).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PortfolioManagementChangeRequest' && $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'CMSS Headquarters User' && $Profile.Name <> 'IntegrationUser' && NOT( ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '400') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '401') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '402') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '403') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '404') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '405') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '406') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '407') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '408') || ISPICKVAL(ChangeReason__c, '409') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Change Reason. Please select Change Reason 400-409.
